original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karonti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḍampi karonti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissanti seyyathā api gihiniyaḥ kāmabhoginiyaḥ ti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhuniyaḥ tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā, tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissantī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissanti iti

original: Atha kho bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: atha kho bhikkhuniyaḥ bhikkhūnam etam attham ārocesu

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karontī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḍampi karonti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ udake uccāram pi passāvam pi kheḍam pi karissanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Na udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: na udake uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhunīnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena gilānā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi kātuṁ kukkuccāyanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena gilānāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ udake uccāram pi passāvam pi kheḍam pi kātum kukkuccāyanti

original: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānāya bhikkhuniyā udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi kātuṁ.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave gilānāya bhikkhuniyāḥ udake uccāram pi passāvam pi kheḷam pi kātu

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Na udake agilānā uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: na udake a gilānā uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Na udake agilānāya uccāro vā passāvo vā kheḷo vā kātabbo.
analyzed: na udake a gilānāya uccāraḥ vā passāvaḥ vā kheḷaḥ vā kātabbo

original: Yā anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake agilānā uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yā anādariyam paṭicca udake a gilānā uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karoti āpatti dukkaṭassa
tasmai tuṇhī evam etam dhārayāmi iti
